intro: Saturnyne Rams armies gain 140 formation points (F/p), 60 upgrade points (U/p), 20 Titan points (T/p), and 20 Ally points (A/p) for a normal sized battle. A negative U/p value means that you gain that many upgrade points for taking a particular formation.
strategy: Solar Auxilia armies have a Strategy Rating of 2.
Initiative: Legiones Astartes allied Detachments and Collegia Titanica allied Banners have an Initiative Rating of 1+. Solar Auxilia Tercios have an Initiative Rating of 2+, and are subject to the 'Warriors of the Void' special rule. Questoris Familia Lances have an Initiative Rating of 2+ and are subject to the 'Chivalry' special rule.

sections.name: Saturnyne Rams Core Tercios
sections.description: Saturnyne Rams armies must contain one Cohort Command Tercio, and at least one Lasrifle Tercio.

formations.units: One Auxilia Legate Command Squad, four Auxilia Lasrifle Squad, and one Auxilia Flamer Squad
